price: Aliye kuwa akinambia: Hivyo wewe ni katika wanao sadiki.
footnotes: Akisema: Ati wewe ni katika hao wanao sadiki kuwa kupo kufufuliwa na kuhisabiwa na kulipwa baada ya kufa?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
